There were no other sightings in Jackson on or around March 22nd 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsMy Daughter and I were driving west on I 94 in jackson last night at approx, 10:15.As we apprached the exit ramp onto Airport rd we saw three spectacular flashesof a white silvery light. The lights lasted approx,3 to 4 seconds and as each light blinked out it would reappear in a different location going up and down and side to side as the lights were heading in an easterly direction. As we looked back in just a mill second the light s just shot off and dissappeared.Me and my dauughter, just looked at each other as if we had seen a ghost and were pretty shook up at what we had just wittnessed.
Summary: Driving West on I 94 in Jackson Mi saw 3 quick flashes of a spectacular light.
